alert.note: Alert for Cannon; De Kalb; Jackson; Overton; Putnam; Smith; White; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 5:55PM CDT until July 12 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Overton County in Middle Tennessee... Southeastern Smith County in Middle Tennessee... De Kalb County in Middle Tennessee... Southern Jackson County in Middle Tennessee... Southeastern Wilson County in Middle Tennessee... Northwestern White County in Middle Tennessee... Putnam County in Middle Tennessee... Northeastern Cannon County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 554 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Watertown to Gainesboro, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cookeville, Smithville, Gainesboro, Algood, Monterey, Watertown, Baxter, Gordonsville, Hickman, Alexandria, Dowelltown, Liberty, Auburntown, Hamptons Crossroads, Bakers Crossroads, Burgess Falls State Park, Rickman, Center Hill Lake, Crawford and Edgar Evans State Park. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 257 and 301. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Cannon; De Kalb; Jackson; Overton; Putnam; Smith; White; Wilson
